item.title: Standard Operating Procedure of A Small Business
item.description: A Standard Operating Procedure or [SOP](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Standard_operating_procedure#:~:text=A%20standard%20operating%20procedure%20(SOP,to%20comply%20with%20industry%20regulations.) means is structured documentation that provides step-by-step guidelines and instructions on how to do a particular business activity, such as production or record keeping. We need SOP in a company with different operations in different areas. Example of business operating procedure manual: Standard operating procedures or SOP needs to develop as a structured documented office word or pdf file and manual printed copy for management approval.
